# AUDIO::SET_RADIO_AUTO_UNFREEZE

## Summary
If true the radio will automatically unfreeze as soon as the player gets in a vehicle

## Parameters
* **BOOL** enable

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
PARAM NOTES
